title: Rise in lung adenocarcinoma linked to 'light' cigarette use

title_detail.value: Rise in lung adenocarcinoma linked to 'light' cigarette use

summary: So-called 'light' cigarettes have no health benefits to smokers and have likely contributed to the rise of a certain form of lung cancer that occurs deep in the lungs, new research has found.

summary_detail.value: So-called 'light' cigarettes have no health benefits to smokers and have likely contributed to the rise of a certain form of lung cancer that occurs deep in the lungs, new research has found.
